messages.name: Urgent Booking
messages.text: Hi! I'd like to book you for a corporate event this Friday evening. We need a DJ from 7-11pm. Can you confirm availability ASAP? Budget is $2000.

messages.name: Invoice Follow-up
messages.text: Hey, I sent payment last week but haven't received the invoice yet. Can you send it by end of day? I need it for my expense report.

messages.name: Refund Request
messages.text: The product I ordered never shipped. Can I get a refund? This was supposed to arrive last week.

messages.name: Collaboration Inquiry
messages.text: Love your work! I'm working on a project next month and would love to collaborate. Are you open to discussing a partnership? No rush!

messages.name: Brand Outreach
messages.text: Hi! I represent Nike and we're looking for creators to partner with for our new campaign launching next quarter. Would you be interested in learning more?

messages.name: Feature Request
messages.text: Would be great if you added dark mode to your app. Just a suggestion for future updates!

messages.name: Affiliate Inquiry
messages.text: Do you have an affiliate program? I'd love to promote your products to my audience.

messages.name: Casual Compliment
messages.text: Just wanted to say your latest post was amazing! Keep up the great work! ðŸ”¥

messages.name: General Question
messages.text: What camera do you use for your videos? Been following for a while and love the quality.

messages.name: Time-Sensitive Logistics
messages.text: Can you confirm you received my package? I need to know if I should reship by tomorrow.
